title: Dinnerbone:启动器已经完成Mojang账号到Twitch的绑定
author: Neubulaeko
txt_content:
看不到图片或者网速渣的点击这里：

Nathan Adams @Dinnerbone

Finished the bridge of mojang account -> twitch in the launcher, feeling good about releasing a snapshot soon!


完成了启动器内有关Mojang账号到Twitch绑定的设定！对于稍后的快照感觉良好！

replies.author: 米安博奥
replies.txt_content: 速度好快的说  围观围观

replies.author: wjwrh
replies.txt_content: 楼主是要当新闻官的节奏啊.
